snippet: The private equity industry has come under scrutiny as Mitt Romney’s Republican rivals have attacked his record at the investment firm Bain Capital.
abstract: Private equity industry comes under scrutiny as Mitt Romney’s Republican rivals attack his record at investment firm Bain Capital; his opponents accuse such firms of carving up companies and cutting jobs; attacks unnerve many buyout executives, especially those who have long used their fortunes to support the Republican Party.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and ANNIE LOWREY

lead_paragraph: The private equity industry has come under scrutiny as Mitt Romney’s Republican rivals have attacked his record at the investment firm Bain Capital.

headline.main: As Romney Advances, Private Equity Becomes Part of the Debate
headline.print_headline: As Romney Campaign Advances, Private Equity Becomes Part of the Debate
